reviews.review_text: I ve used Limor s services a few times now, and I m fully satisfied each and every time. Her team is courteous, professional, and so very efficient. (Packed a 2700-sq feet, 4-person house in 3-4 hours!)  For this most recent move, we also used their unpacking service, and man was I impressed!  The team was very thoughtful in where they put things and asked questions when they thought I may have a preference (since kitchen placement is so personal!). I especially appreciated how they removed all the boxes (from BBX moving), cardboard, and paper and put them in the carport, so the house felt ready to live in when they were done. So amazing!  (BBX Moving came and removed ALL the boxes and cardboard and trash the next day). Limor herself is always responsive, patient, and extremely pleasant to deal with. In the few times that I ve worked with her, I  always get a sense that she works very hard, takes pride in her work, and has a very strong work ethic. All in all, I would not hesitate to recommend them. Worth every penny!!

Had them come box up everything before a renovation.  They are very professional, very efficient and courteous; they packed everything perfectly even the oddly shaped items, that I was concerned with.  Fragile stickers where needed and all boxes labeled! Very thankful to Limor and her staff!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much Elizabeth. We are grateful to be of help.

reviews.review_text: Vancouver in the Box exceeded all my expectations. They set up a video call right away to give me an initial quote and took the time to do a second video call after I got through decluttering. The Team that showed up at my house was professional, friendly and quick. They took time to walk me through what was done to make sure everything was done to my satisfaction and colour coded my boxes. Great job guys! I highly recommend this company.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Genoa! We are happy to take the stress away from your move!

reviews.review_text: Vancouver In The Box gave highly professional, exceptional work from start to finish. Limor and her team are amazing at what they do, and they provide courteous, caring service throughout. They come in with a plan, they hussle, and they get it done right! You won t go wrong in hiring them. We began with an on-site consultation where Limor walked through the house, took notes, asked questions about priorities, and provided suggestions on how to proceed. We decided to utilize her team for packing as well as some unpacking services. I am so very glad we did. It was critically important for us that we minimize the chaos of the move for Dad. He has memory issues that make any change to his environment frustrating and confusing for him. Limor proposed that we split packing across two days and leave the key pieces like Dad s bedroom and his tv room for the last moment. Also, they photographed Dad s space and when unpacking they essentially recreated it in our new place so that he immediately felt at home. It was brilliant! I wish I had taken photos of the boxes they packed so you could see the attention to detail in their work. We did not lose a single piece to breakage, and we had around 200 boxes of goods being moved. Everything was labelled and colour coded. And their art inventory service is such a great idea, I highly recommend taking advantage of that too. I m not going to tell you it was cheap because frankly it wasn t. But let s get real here: we hired trained professionals to provide a skilled service that supported our move and made our lives so much easier. I can tell you with absolute conviction that it was money very well spent, and we received excellent value for our investment.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much Joanne for sharing your experience . Its was our pleasure to take the task of packing and unpacking from your family!

reviews.review_text: Best moving experience ever in my life. They came to my house and packed everything in two hours. Then they unpacked after movers finished their job. They helped me figuring out my new place storage cupboards in kitchen, washroom and closets. This took away so much stress I had around the move. My new place was all unpacked and ready within two hours. No cardboard boxes to recycle, no tape, wrapping paper. All was taken care of as they bring their own plastic containers which were picked up right away. Stress free worth gold decision. So glad I worked with this company. I wouldn t do it any way in the future. Highly recommend Limor and her team. They were amazing.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Claudia! Our pleasure :)

reviews.review_text: I hired Vancouver in the Box to pack up my condo for a recent move. I have to say I hate packing and I love these guys!! They changed my life. Because I move a lot for my work, I will hire them every time. I couldn t believe they had my entire condo packed up in 3.5 hours. They did an amazing job and followed exactly what I asked of them. So grateful to have this service. Worth every penny!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much Crystal. We love taking the stress away from the move :)

reviews.review_text: Great company. Best money we spent on moving. The staff are trained, organized and professional. Got the job done so fast and the packing quality and labeling is excellent. It will save you money with movers since everything is so organized. Limore was very easy to talk to and communication was great. Highly recommend .
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much Mary! We are happy to take this task away from you :)

reviews.review_text: Top notch company! We have worked with them for over 10 years and have been extremely pleased with our business relationship. They provide the best packing services in town and we are delighted to be their associate partner.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you !

reviews.review_text: Limor was a delight to work with. I wasnt on site for the move and she worked with people onsite to make sure everything was packed up as desired. I also required a moving company and storage locker at last minute and she went over and above and arranged both for me quickly and professionally. It really helped to set my mind at ease with not being there personally to oversee everything! Wouldnt hesitate to recommend her to anyone.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Trysta. Its our pleasure to take the stress away from you!

reviews.review_text: Excellent business operation. Great value for a great and thorough service. Really appreciated having Limor in charge of our whole move from arranging the boxes, to the packing and unpacking and connecting us to a great moving company. Then packers were also great. Very careful and helpful. The move was as seamless as it could be - which helps when you have a toddler and a newborn.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much Jackie! We were happy to take this stress away from your move.

reviews.review_text: I have had the opportunity of working with Limor and her crew multiple times in my business at You Move Me.  Her crew is highly organized, very professional, and easy to work with.  The one thing I appreciate the most about working with Limor is her great level of customer service.  For her its about setting the customer up for success instead of just providing a service. There have been many times where the two of us have had conversations prior the the pack/move days for a client and formulated a plan to ensure we dont get into each others way and also ensure that the customer is taken care of when it comes to packing, moving, and unpacking. This allows us to deliver a great experience and continue to serve our local community together :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much Prabh. Always pleasure working with you as well!

reviews.review_text: Limor and her staff of Vancouver In the Box were extremely helpful for my complicated move. They made sure to accommodate my needs and were available in the small time frame when I needed them. They were also very efficient and careful with my stuff. Im glad I learned about this business. I would highly recommend them!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Celia! Pleasure working with you.

reviews.review_text: My wife and I plus 2 young kids had a tight move-in date with a sale and purchase of homes. Vancouver in the Box crew was absolutely wonderful. They came in with boxes, everything was packed and labelled while we were taking care of drop offs and pick ups kids from activities. Best of all, the manner in which they coordinate everything with the boxes and movers, in the end, saved us time and loads of stress. I will never move again without them! highly recommended..worth every penny. Thank you!

The services provided by Vancouver in the Box were excellent. We used them to pack a condo that our company was renovating. They were able to provide a quote through a video conference. Once the team arrived they documented the location of every item to make sure that once the reno was done they could unpack in the same location every item. They professionally packed every item and coordinated the storage. I will not hesitate to use Vancouver in the box services again!!

Top notch experience with VITB! The team was extremely professional, efficient, thoughtful and courteous.  All I had to do was get out of their way,and they made it all happen.  Worth every single penny!! I strongly recommend you take their unpacking services too.  It took the stress out of moving.  I would definitely use them again!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much . Its our pleasure to take the stress away!

reviews.review_text: Always amazing! Weve used them before and Id use them again and recommend them easily to everyone. Thank you so much for a great move!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Greg, Its our pleasure to make it a stress free move

reviews.review_text: Vancouver in the Box helped us during a complicated move with a toddler, into a house that was not yet finished. It was a stressful time, so I am greatful that Vancouver in the Box was there to take at least some of that stress away. Their packing and unpacking service was perfect and such a lifesaver.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Silvia. We were happy to be there!

reviews.review_text: Limor and her team packed our 4400 square foot home with ease and professionalism. They were efficient, knowledgable, easy to talk through the process with and made our out of town move a dream! I must say that Limor was the icing on the cake. She was SO amazing to work with, start to finish.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much Laura! It was our pleasure working with you!

reviews.review_text: Ive used Limor Friedman and her team at Vancouver in the Box a couple of times over the last few years. They work very well together as a team, they are reliable, friendly, and efficient. Its been such a relief to leave my household in their capable hands for packing, go to work, and come home to find my belongings all professionally packed in clean boxes at the end of the day. I highly recommend Limor and her team for professional packing...and as a resource for all matters related to moving.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much Monika, its a pleasure serving you .

reviews.review_text: Limor and her team at Vancouver In The Box are incredible! They showed up right on schedule, packed up all of our items with care, and holy smokes do they pack quickly! It was really convenient having VITB pack up for our move. From the initial walk-through estimate all the way to having the boxes picked up once we unpacked, the entire process was a breeze. Coordinating with Limor was great, she responded very quickly to any of our inquiries, and she also sent us a handy reminder prior to the packing date. VITB made our move completely stress-free. My wife and I recommend them without hesitation!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: It was  pleasure taking this task away from you Christopher!!

reviews.review_text: They say we pack you relax, and they are not kidding! They packed the entire apartment (1 bedroom) in less than 2 hours. They required nothing from me except for a quick walk through before they began (to make sure they knew where everything was and mark items that I didnt want them to pack) and after they were done (to make sure everything I wanted to be packed was packed). They were extremely nice and polite, and not only did they do an amazing job, but they also did it so quietly that I was actually able to work the entire time they were there. All of the boxes were labeled, so we knew whats where, and because they knew we would be moving the boxes ourselves, they made sure to pack in a way so no box was overly heavy. Moving is a tiring and stressful experience. Especially for people who work full time and dont have the luxury of taking their time. Do yourself a favour and let Limor and her staff take care of the packing for you. You will not regret it. I know we definitely will next time we move too!

This is the second time we have used Vancouver In The Box . Moving is so very stressful but Limor s team takes the packing and unpacking stresses out of your life. . From ordering Bungo Boxes to assisting us in picking the movers our move went very smoothly.   Virginia the team leader was amazing -so well organized. We would recommend them  in a heartbeat .

I have nothing but good things to say about Vancouver in the Box. We contracted Limor and her team for a residential move, both packing and unpacking. I was impressed by their professionalism and efficiency, from the initial consultation to the final box. None of our items were broken during the move and their level of organization, down to returning items to the exact shelf of the bookcase where they had originated, was pretty extraordinary. They even set up our printer. Instead of our move taking us three weeks it took us three days -- worth every penny. An additional nod to our packers Kerith (Im sorry Im probably spelling your name wrong!) and Elizabeth who were delightful to work with.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Elyse! We enjoy taking this stress away from you.

reviews.review_text: Professional! We had bad experience with another mover, as a result, the house was a mess and we could not find anything for several days. Then came Vancouver in the box on the weekend, unpacked all the boxes and put things in order, we were able to use the house again. It greatly alleviate the mount of stress we were having. Life savers! We will definitely use them for both packing and unpacking next time.

Vancouver in the Box did an incredible job! Limor came over to give us a thorough quote and run through their services. On the day of the pack, her team arrived on time and finished the job in only a few hours. Our belongings are extremely well organized with all of the boxes labeled. Vancouver in the Box coordinated with Bungobox so our move had as little waste as possible. Thank you SO much Vancouver in the Box!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much Jillian for taking the time and write a review. We enjoyed taking this task away from you!

reviews.review_text: TRUST ME- this is an investment you will not regret. After one extremely successful move two years ago, we hired Limor and her team again for our move this weekend. Not only are your items all packed nice and secure, but each box is labelled and numbered to help you quickly unpack. One of the greatest parts of using Vancouver in The Box is how great Limors communication back and forth is, you arent left waiting to hear back on items that effect critical timelines (ie: elevator bookings). This wont be the last time we use Vancouver in the Box and I cant recommend them enough
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much! Pleasure working with you!

reviews.review_text: Very friendly, extremely fast and efficient. The only negatives I have are that I feel the price was slightly high for the amount of stuff I had and I had a nice suit that was crudely jammed into the bottom of a box. Everything else was packed extremely well however so the suit was the exception not the rule. Update: They were very apologetic re: the suit and refunded me $40 to have it professionally pressed.

Vancouver In The Box is A...MAZE...ING!  We were moving from a townhouse in downtown Vancouver to an apartment nearby with absolutely no time to do anything other than call someone.  We did our homework and lined up three moving companies to come in, take a look, and provide estimates including packing and unpacking.  Vancouver In The Box wasn t the cheapest, but they were the only ones that we had full confidence in and in the end it was obvious exactly where the extra money was going - it was worth every penny.  Theresa in particular was simply the most professional and impressive person we have ever worked with in all of our lives.  We threw her quite a few curve balls and she hit all of them out of the park with ease.  Moving is usually very stressful, and it was so nice to have someone constantly stepping up and saying  I ve got this.   We re now recommending them to everyone we meet, and that includes you.  Do yourself a favor and choose this company for your next move :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Marty and Wendy ! We love AMAZING clients like you:)

reviews.review_text: Vancouver in the box is an absolutely fantastic way to pack. I was so stressed out before my move and i was never going to be able to do everything on my own before the moving date. I emailed V in the B two days before I asked them to come and I was spazzing out stressed out of my mind. Their email response (10 minutes after my initial email) calmed me down immediately and they came two days later. Now listen to this. They packed my whole 1500 sqft townhouse that was completely full including a garage completely full of stuff (borderline hoarder status) ALL BEFORE LUNCH TIME!!  Seriously started at 9 we re done by 12. 70 Boxes completely full and all of my art preoffesionaly packed. Everything professionally packed wrapped in paper. Nothing was broken or damaged. Absolutely top notch awesome work!! Would recommend to anyone and would totally use them again!!
Limor & her team did a fantastic job.  They made our move a little less stressful.  I would definitely recommend their services.  Thank you again, Limor & The Vancouver In The Box Team

I have been working with Limor at Vancouver In the Box for years. The VITB crew are punctual, efficient and make the stressful part of packing for a move EASIER. Sit back, relax and let their team help organize your move with their plastic BungoBoxes! Bonus - they can help you unpack too!!!! This service is a luxury you cant afford not to use. Call them for your next move, promise you wont be sorry.
Limor, Mari and her team were incredible and thorough. It was honestly the best money I ve ever spent and would not hesitate to recommend their services to anyone.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you  Lara! Our pleasure to take the packing task from your busy life:)

reviews.review_text: I was feeling very stressed about the move, and decided to look into a packing company to make that part of the process easier. Not only were they incredibly friendly and professional with everything, but they were faster and more cost-effective than I had expected. With a service like this, I will never pack myself again!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you!

reviews.review_text: Limor and her teammates were extremely professional, friendly and efficient. I would highly recommend their services for those who want a stress-free move! Thank you Limor!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much Miguel!

reviews.review_text: I knew about the service. I was sure I didn t need it. I kept telling myself  I can do it all alone  until I called them a day before my move. I called for help and 2 working bees came with everything they needed. They took control over the kitchen and the kids  room at my request. In a matter of 3 hours (!!!) they have done more than I did in a week! Highly recommended and surprisingly not expensive

A great service for when you want to completely remove the stress of moving!  The awesome, easy-going packers and unpackers did a great job looking after our stuff and arranging and organizing it in our new place.  Thankyou!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you James! Pleasure working with your family.

reviews.review_text: I had antique china shipped from Vancouver to Gatineau QC and it was all arranged from Gatineau! Everything arrived safe and sound at our house. Fast and friendly service. Very flexible and professional people. Thanks Limor
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your kindness Philippe. Always happy to help!

reviews.review_text: Great team, very qualified. Limor even helped me find the right movers and cleaners to fit my relocation schedule. Definitely recommend them.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Catherine! We are happy to serve busy professionals like your self !

reviews.review_text: One of the two movers we used was very impressed by the way the packers taped all around the edges of the boxes - he sure doesnt see that very often. Thanks Limor for your teams hard work.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Mimi!  Enjoy your new home

reviews.review_text: Limor and her team were awesome.  My mobility is limited and I really needed some help.  Very grateful for the fantastic service. Thanks Limor!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Monica!! We love taking this stress away from you.

reviews.review_text: Two time happy customer: thanks for the extra attention to artwork and being punctual. Limor s  team even helped coordinate movers for us. Thanks!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Sam ! Glad to keep high quality years after as well.

reviews.review_text: I highly recommend Vancouver In The Box - they were friendly, fast, professional and wow did it ever take the stress out of our move. Never going back to doing the packing on my own again!
Packed my 3 bedroom home efficiently and carefully. Saved me a lot of time. Would definitely recommend this company.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much !!

reviews.review_text: Excellent and professional service with no hassles. Just exactly as promised. I would recommend 100%
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Julen, its our pleasure to take the stress away!

reviews.review_text: Fast friendly and efficient crew, very professional! Only downside was that slightly more boxes than necessary were used.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Trevor ! we love taking the stress of packing away from you!

reviews.review_text: Great service, highly recommended. Professional, fast and friendly. Totally worth it!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Many thanks. Out pleasure

reviews.review_text: Limor is super helpful and knowledgeable. 10/10 would recommend!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you!

reviews.review_text: Very efficient and well organized throughout the packing and unpacking process..
Great Company
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you !

reviews.review_text: I used these guys before I was very disappointed.They charged double of what I was first promised,plus hidden fees,and it took them way more time than what they initially said it would. They were slow and constantly on their phones. Wont ever use them or recommend them again !
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Ahmad. Even to write a fake review you have to do some research. If you were ever a client, you would probably know by now that you have to sign on a fixed price quote. We do nit charge by the hour so time is never an issue. On our firm quote you will have a list of services and supplies which doesn t leave room to  hide  any fees. We can t charge you  double  simply because we don t have surprises, as we estimate each client personally and send an accurate invoice accordingly. And finally, thank you for the opportunity to explain why we are different than others in this industry:)

reviews.review_text: The boxes were not labelled correctly. Care was not taken to ensure that the boxes were well taped. Care was not taken to make sure the boxes were plastic lined inside so clothes would not get damaged in rain or water during long transit. It was a shoddy job where the girls wanted to finish quickly and get out.
